title: Lenovo debuts 11-inch IdeaPad Duet 3 with slimmer bezels, Chrome OS, $399 price tag
content:
Chromebook tablets have been growing in popularity over the past couple of years, and Lenovo especially has been doubling down on the form factor. After launching the Chromebook Duet 5 last year, Lenovo is today announcing the smaller, but equally specced, IdeaPad Duet 3.

moreâ€¦

The post Lenovo debuts 11-inch IdeaPad Duet 3 with slimmer bezels, Chrome OS, $399 price tag appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 3 has gone official with a revamped spec sheet, bigger display, and a new chipset from Qualcomm.
